entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
